definitions.definition: ( archaic , historical ) Former name of Sri Lanka : an island country in South Asia [prior to 1972] .
( very rare ) A male given name transferred from the place name .
( computer languages ) An object-oriented , strongly statically typed programming language with an emphasis on immutability .

main_definition: ( archaic , historical ) Former name of Sri Lanka : an island country in South Asia [prior to 1972] .
secondary_definitions: ( very rare ) A male given name transferred from the place name .
( computer languages ) An object-oriented , strongly statically typed programming language with an emphasis on immutability .
